import React from "react" import Moment from "react-moment" import {useSelector} from "react-redux" //components import HammerButton from "./HammerButton" const Post = (props) => { const users = useSelector((state) => state.getUsersReducer.users) const result = users.find(({userId}) => userId === props.post.userId) console.log(result) return (
{props.post.userName}

{props.post.createdAt._seconds}

{props.post.postText}

Be the first to Hammer down

) } export default Post
